description: Updates the specified policy template. You can update only the description and the some elements of the policyBody.

parameters.name: policyStoreId
parameters.description: Specifies the ID of the policy store that contains the policy template that you want to update.

parameters.name: policyTemplateId
parameters.description: Specifies the ID of the policy template that you want to update.

parameters.name: statement
parameters.description: Specifies new statement content written in Cedar policy language to replace the current body of the policy template. You can change only the following elements of the policy body: The action referenced by the policy template. Any conditional clauses, such as when or unless clauses. You can't change the following elements: The effect ( permit or forbid) of the policy template. The principal referenced by the policy template. The resource referenced by the policy template.

nested_items.name: policyStoreId
nested_items.description: The ID of the policy store that contains the updated policy template.

nested_items.name: policyTemplateId
nested_items.description: The ID of the updated policy template.

nested_items.name: createdDate
nested_items.description: The date and time that the policy template was originally created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedDate
nested_items.description: The date and time that the policy template was most recently updated.
